Give brief idea about your complaint/experience on site
Empowering Your Digital Safety with “ ETHICAL LENS ”

Dear Users,

We are excited to share with you the innovative & useful application in digital security Ethical Lens. As the developers behind this groundbreaking app, we want to express our gratitude for joining us on this journey to create a safer and more transparent online environment If any victim complaint against this companies in consumer court then, most of the time companies are Winner or escape in front of judges of courts.

Ethical Lens is not just an app; it's your guardian against dark patterns, deceptive design practices & also for terms and conditions of sites. We're committed to empowering you with the tools and knowledge needed to navigate the digital landscape securely.

We also Introducing the Security Percentage feature, offering you a real-time, transparent measure of the security level of websites and apps according to companies terms and conditions. We set limit of 90 percentage, but if some companies score below 90 % then directly open register complaint section.we reduce your complaint timing.

Your voice matters. Ethical Lens allows you to register complaints against insecure apps directly. One more main feature tracking complaint, they provides real time complaint status, we can hold developers accountable for creating safer digital spaces

Connect with like-minded users in our Community Chat feature. Share insights, experiences, and tips on identifying and avoiding dark patterns. This community is your digital support system, and your active participation makes it stronger.

Thank you for choosing Ethical Lens. Together, let's create a digital landscape where security, transparency, and community collaboration reign supreme.

Stay Secure,

(Team Ethical Lens)
